"Wake Me Up Before You Go-Go" by Wham! - This song would be perfect to start the day with its upbeat and catchy tune, and the lyrics about wanting to wake up and start living.
"Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey - This classic rock song would be a great addition to the soundtrack of life, with its empowering message to never give up and keep on dreaming.
"Bohemian Rhapsody" by Queen - This iconic song would be a great way to add some variety and excitement to life, with its unique blend of rock, opera, and ballad.
"I Will Survive" by Gloria Gaynor - This empowering song would be a great addition to the soundtrack of life, with its message of resilience and determination to overcome any obstacle.
"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor - This classic rock song would be a great way to add some energy and motivation to life, with its uplifting lyrics and powerful instrumental.
